connect20/webgriffe_tphpro.name: connect20/Webgriffe_TphPro

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/webgriffe_tphpro.description: An enhanced Template Path Hints extension for Magento that inserts references to used Magento Blocks inside HTML code, avoiding the usage of the more invasive built in Template Path Hints.
